body:
I just got this error message (on current stable, beta, and the nightly mentioned below): ```plain error[E0387]: cannot borrow data mutably in a captured outer variable in an `Fn` closure --> src/main.rs:30:57 | 30 | .for_each(|filename| tally_words(filename, &mut words).unwrap()); | ^^^^^ | help: consider changing this closure to take self by mutable reference --> src/main.rs:30:19 | 30 | .for_each(|filename| tally_words(filename, &mut words).unwrap()); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ``` As you can see it suggests to do no change at all: ```diff - .for_each(|filename| tally_words(filename, &mut words).unwrap()); + .for_each(|filename| tally_words(filename, &mut words).unwrap()); ``` You can reproduce this by checking out and running `cd episode/9/rust/pascal/; cargo build`.
Rust version 
rustc 1.30.0-nightly (f8d34596f 2018-08-30)
